goals__remit: BT is an innovative, high-quality rail systems integrator and services provider, with a focus on modular, standardized platforms and a selective market approach, generating profitable, sustainable growth. We deliver on time while making an optimal use of our resources, being right the first time as per customer and regulatory expectations thanks to an engaged, enabled, qualified and flexible workforce.
